lead_paragraph: Unfolding 22 years after the events of "Jurassic Park," this fourth film in the franchise takes place in a newly constructed resort on Isla Nublar, where humanity's continuing efforts to dominate nature generate unexpected, and dangerous, results.
snippet: Unfolding 22 years after the events of "Jurassic Park," this fourth film in the franchise takes place in a newly constructed resort on Isla Nublar, where humanity's continuing efforts to dominate nature generate unexpected, and dangerous, results.
